argSrc: Supermarkets and shopping centres should be allowed to open any Sundays and holidays at their discretion.
argTrg: For in this way, Sunday shopping days would be better spread out through the year.

argSrc: Supermarkets and shopping centres should be allowed to open any Sundays and holidays at their discretion.
argTrg: Also streets and shops would presumably be emptier

argSrc: Supermarkets and shopping centres should be allowed to open any Sundays and holidays at their discretion.
argTrg: as not everyone would be open on the same day.

argTrg: However then you'd have a worse overview of which shop is open on a given day.
